mdRecord.dcterms:title: Law School Law Day 1968
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Law School alumni banquet. Identified: Edgar F. Shannon, Jr., Fourth President of Uva [1959-1974] (far left); Hardy C. Dillard, Class of 1927, fourth Dean of the School of Law [1963-1968] with Charles P. Light, Dean of the Washington and Lee Law School.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
